no-user-id.error:
You have to put your discord id!

Voice chat won't work for you.
no-guild-id.error:
As the main player you have to put your guild ID!

Voice chat won't work.
no-bot-token.error:
As the main player, you have to enter your bot's token!

Voice chat won't work.
no-gmcm-installed.warning: "Generic Mod Config Menu" is not installed, it is recommended to install it to make configuring this mod easier.
